Name: Herbal Peony
SeedDescription: Plant in spring. Takes 13 days to produce a large flower.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera. Toma 13 días para producir una flor larga.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄에 심습니다. 13일후에 매우 커다란 꽃이 핍니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Im Frühjahr pflanzen. Die Produktion einer großen Blume dauert 13 Tage.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-a na primavera. Demoram 13 dias para nascer uma flor grande.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте весной. Через 13 дней вырастает большой цветок.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天播种。13天产出硕大的花朵。
